name: MetaMaze
description:
MetaMaze

A procedurally generated maze full of arcade games made for AIJAM (March 21-29).

Controls:

WASD to walk.

Click on doors to open and close them, click on arcade game screens to emulate the game in a browser.

Look with the mouse.

Space to jump.

Use the End key to restart the game with a new maze to explore.

Note:

An internet connection is necessary to load some game textures and links to emulation.

Arcade Game Instructions:

For game instructions, click on the "Internet Arcade: [name of game]" link above the game window.
